result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kedric J Ross

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Sentencing hearing on December 6, 2016 at 03:00 pm.

CASES: 15CM342 & 16CF90. Defendant Kedric J Ross in court with attorney Brian Thomas Smestad.  Defendant Kedric J Ross in custody.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 10:31 am.  
16CF90-Count 1-NC plea.  CT accepts plea, adj guilty & judgment entered.  All other counts DRI.
15CM342-DRI.
No firearms, cannot vote until civil rights restored, cannot hold elected office, other civil rights may be lost until restored, no body armor, if not US citizen face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights.

Order PSI, long form.  Agent does not need to be present.  PSI due 11/21/16.  Bond cont.  10:53 am adj.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for December 6, 2016 at 03:00 pm.
Pre-trial conference on September 23, 2016 at 09:45 am.

CASES: 16CF90 & 15CM342. Defendant Kedric J Ross in court with attorney Brian Thomas Smestad.  Defendant Kedric J Ross in custody.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 10:10 am.  Bond cont.  10:33 am adj.
COVERS CASES: 16CF90 & 15CM342.  Not to have contact with:  David Ross, David Chandler & Curtis Lundgren, Jonzie's Market.
Report in support of probable cause for arrest. Request for criminal complaint.
Status conference on July 18, 2016 at 10:00 am.

CASES: 16CF90 & 15CM342. Defendant Kedric J Ross in court with attorney Brian Thomas Smestad.  Defendant Kedric J Ross in custody.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 1:23 pm.  
16CF90-CT sets bond.  15CM342-Smestad-NG plea.  CT sets bond as to both files.  Warrants are quashed.  1:35 pm adj.
Defendant Kedric J Ross not in court.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CW-clerk 3:38 pm.  ADA-motion for warrant.  CT-warrant authorized, issued.  3:38 pm adj.
Report in support of probable cause for arrest. Request for criminal complaint.
